div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1553 Antakya (anc. Antioch), Seleucis, 1959 Burial: c. 150 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 4 AV, 28 AR Demetrius I: Antiocheia 3 octadr., 1 dr.; unc. mints 28 tetradr. Disposition: Boston 2; Dewing coll. 1 Boston, Greek Coins 1950-63, nos. 277, 279 Information from H. Seyrig
